author: dblevins
msg: Got sick of not being able to unit test vanilla ejb 2 jars (i.e. ejb1.1 + local interfaces)
so I added local interface support.
The webadmin was updated as well so that it can display and invoke local interfaces

msg: Compute OPENEJB_HOME if it's not set (based on the Ant scripts)

msg: No reason to continuously append the URL package prefixes with the same prefix.
